body_text: We already include Underscore.js which has a clone method for objects that I believe does the same thing as this. I think we should just use that since I'd rather not maintain utility methods unless we absolutely have to. Plus Underscore goes through extensive testing.
body: We already include Underscore.js which has a `clone` method for objects that I believe does the same thing as this. I think we should just use that since I'd rather not maintain utility methods unless we absolutely have to. Plus Underscore goes through extensive testing.
